string.text: mixed,artifacts|3|4
finder|Holy shit guys, I just found a Goldfish artifact near %location%!
skeptic|Bullshit, %finder_name%. Goldfish artifacts are super rare.
expert|Actually, there was an emission yesterday. Could have spawned new artifacts.
finder|I'm telling you, it's real! I can prove it!
buyer|If it's real, I'll pay 50k for it right now.
skeptic|%buyer_name%, don't be an idiot. Make him show proof first.
finder|Meet me at the bar and I'll show you. Bring the cash.
faction,planning,raid|3|4
leader|Alright boys, we're hitting that military checkpoint tomorrow at dawn.
scout|I scouted it yesterday. They've got at least 8 guards on rotation.
veteran|Eight? That's more than last time. We'll need a distraction.
demo|I've got some IEDs ready. Could hit their supply truck when it arrives.
leader|Good thinking, %demo_name%. %scout_name%, what time does the truck usually show?
scout|Around 0600 hours, like clockwork.
veteran|Perfect. We hit the truck, then storm in during the chaos.
leader|It's settled then. Everyone gear up and get some rest.
emergency,mutants,danger|3|5
spotter|FUCK! Bloodsucker pack moving towards the rookie village!
guard|How many? I'm at the south gate!
spotter|I count at least 4, maybe 5! Coming from the east!
leader|All fighters to the east wall NOW! %guard_name%, stay at your post!
sniper|I've got eyes on them from the tower. Setting up shots.
guard|Should I evacuate the rookies?
leader|No time! %sniper_name%, start dropping them!
sniper|First one down! They're scattering!
trading,negotiation,friendly|3|3
seller|I've got 20 medkits, 50 bandages, and 100 rounds of 5.45. Interested?
buyer|Depends on the price. What are you asking?
mediator|Hold up, let me check current market prices...
seller|I'm thinking 25k for the whole package.
buyer|That's robbery! I'll give you 15k.
mediator|Fair price would be around 20k. %seller_name%, that's reasonable.
seller|Fine, 20k it is. But %buyer_first%, you're carrying.
science,anomaly,research|3|4
scientist|The gravitational readings near %location% are off the charts!
escort|Is it safe to approach? I'm supposed to keep you eggheads alive.
assistant|We need to get closer for accurate measurements, %escort_name%.
scientist|Look at these readings! This could be a new type of anomaly!
escort|I don't like this. My detector is going crazy.
assistant|Just a bit closer... I'm getting incredible data!
escort|That's it, we're pulling back. NOW!
humor,argument,bar|3|4
drunk|I'm telling you, I saw a pseudogiant juggling cars!
skeptic|%drunk_name%, how much vodka have you had?
witness|Actually... I think I saw it too. Near the factory.
bartender|If you boys are seeing juggling mutants, I'm cutting you off.
drunk|I swear on my mother! It was real!
skeptic|%witness_name%, don't encourage him!
witness|Look, all I'm saying is... the Zone is weird, okay?
rescue,urgent,teamwork|4|5
survivor|Is anyone out there? I'm trapped in the basement at %location%!
responder|This is %responder_name%, I'm 10 minutes out! What's your situation?
survivor|Controller upstairs... killed my whole squad... I'm wounded...
medic|%survivor_name%, this is a medic. How bad are your wounds?
backup|I'm bringing psi-protection. %responder_name%, wait for me!
survivor|Bleeding bad... getting dizzy... please hurry...
responder|Stay awake! We're almost there! %medic_name%, prep the supplies!
backup|I see the building. Going in hot!
faction,politics,debate|3|4
diplomat|We need to discuss the ceasefire terms with %other_faction%.
hawk|Ceasefire? After what they did last week? No way!
moderate|%hawk_name%, we've lost too many people. Maybe it's time to talk.
diplomat|The terms are simple - they stay out of our territory, we stay out of theirs.
hawk|And when they break it? Because they will!
moderate|Then we'll be justified in our response. Right now, we look like the aggressors.
diplomat|I'm meeting with their representative tomorrow. Final objections?
hawk|Just... watch your back, %diplomat_name%.
stash,discovery,excitement|3|4
finder|Guys! I found Strelok's stash! The coordinates were real!
partner|No fucking way! What's inside?
finder|Artifacts, weapons, documents... This is the motherlode!
lookout|Keep it down! Half the Zone will hear you!
partner|%finder_name%, start loading up. How much can we carry?
finder|There's too much! We'll need to make multiple trips.
lookout|Movement to the west! Someone's coming!
partner|Grab what you can! We're leaving NOW!
technical,problem,cooperation|3|3
tech|The main generator just died. We're on backup power.
chief|How long do we have on backup?
assistant|Maybe 2 hours if we shut down non-essentials.
tech|I can fix it, but I need parts from the old station.
chief|That's in the radiation zone. %assistant_name%, do we have suits?
assistant|Two working suits. But the radiation levels...
tech|No choice. I'll go. Need someone to watch my back.
chief|I'll go with you. %assistant_name%, monitor our vitals.
